price: Na wao hawakutumwa wawe walinzi juu yao.
footnotes: Wala hao wakosefu hawakutumwa wawe wa kuwahukumu Waumini kwa kuwaongoza au kuwapoteza, wala kuwa ni walinzi wa vitendo vyao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
